title: Nykaa Expects AI and Digital Marketing to Drive Growth Across Four Beauty Units
description: Nykaa anticipates that artificial intelligence and digital marketing initiatives will drive improved conversion rates and business results. The company expresses confidence that each of its four beauty businesses can enhance profitability, though it continues to face challenges in providing specific financial guidance to stakeholders.
content:
Nykaa 's leadership has expressed optimism about leveraging artificial intelligence and digital marketing to enhance business performance while acknowledging ongoing challenges in providing specific financial guidance to investors and stakeholders.

title: Parliament Budget Session Live: Lok Sabha to take up Budget debate, welfare and reform bills listed
description: Parliament Session Live Updates: The Lok Sabha will take up the general discussion on the Union Budget for 2026-27 on Friday, as Parliament resumes deliberations on key economic and legislative priorities. The House will meet at 11 am to transact government business, beginning with Question Hour. Several Union Ministers, including those handling Health and Family Welfare, Law and Justice, External Affairs, Defence, and Ports, Shipping and Waterways, are scheduled to table official papers. From 3.30 pm onwards, the Lok Sabha will move to Private Members’ Business. A range of Private Members’ Bills are listed for introduction, including proposed Constitution Amendment Bills, changes to the Representation of the People Act, and welfare-related legislation for farmers, fishermen, students, senior citizens, women, and workers. Bills linked to education, healthcare, environmental protection, artificial intelligence, digital platforms, labour reforms, and social security are also on the agenda. Stay with IndiaToday.in for latest and live updates-
content: During the upcoming recess, parliamentary Standing Committees will scrutinise budgetary proposals and expenditure plans of various ministries. Their reports will form the basis for detailed discussions after the session resumes in March. This process... [2864 chars]

title: Savannah Guthrie's demand for mom's 'proof of life' is complicated in this era of AI and deepfakes
description: When Savannah Guthrie made a heart-wrenching plea to the kidnapper of her 84-year-old mother to send “proof of life,” she addressed the possibility of people creating deepfakes. "We live in a world where voices and images are easily manipulated,” she said. Before artificial intelligence tools proliferated — making it possible…

title: US software stocks slammed on mounting fears over AI disruption, lose $1 trillion in week
description: In recent months, US software and data services companies have faced a formidable decline, raising alarm bells among investors. The burgeoning influence of artificial intelligence has cast a shadow over the industry, contributing to a considerable decrease in the market value of numerous tech firms.
content:

title: Amazon projects 50% boost to capital spending this year to $200 billion, shares tumble
description: It is the latest sign that Big Tech will not be hitting the brakes any time soon on hefty AI investments. Amazon shares closed down 4.4% during regular trading as worries deepened about the enormous cost of the artificial-intelligence boom.

title: Anthropic unveils new AI model Claude Opus 4.6 as OpenAI rivalry heats up
description: Anthropic on Thursday released its latest high-performing artificial intelligence model, escalating its challenge to OpenAI in the intensifying AI race. OpenAI is not taking the challenge lying down, and on Thursday released its own business-focused product, a platform for AI agents called Frontier.

title: Amazon sees 50% boost to capital spending this year, shares tumble
description: In a bold strategy to enhance its foothold in artificial intelligence, Amazon is ramping up its investments significantly. This initiative is designed to strengthen its AI prowess against competitors in the market. Despite this ambitious plan, the company's stock experienced a slight decline immediately after the announcement.
